pages.text: Knowing how to perform the $(thing)Ritual of Extraction$() is easily one of the most important skills involved in summoning. This potent practice brutally siphons an entity's soul into a provided $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuring_focus)Conjuring Focus$().$(p)A process inherently unsafe, without pedestals only $(thing)one tenth$() of attempts is said to succeed.

To begin, one must place a $(item)Soul Funnel$() and fill it with both $(item)Soul Sand$() and a $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuring_focus)Conjuring Focus$(). As an optional step, four pedestals may now be placed and linked to the funnel as described in $(l:conjuring:rituals/ritual_basics)Ritual Basics$(). These will be used to stabilize the ritual by providing samples of the entity's essence, supplied in the form of an $(thing)item the entity is known to drop$(). Having four of these present and executing the ritual in a $(thing)Soul Sand Valley$() reportedly guarantees success.

Once everything has been prepared, the entity shall be lured on the funnel. This will make it possible to commence the ritual by $(thing)right-clicking$() the $(item)Soul Funnel$() with a $(l:conjuring:basics/conjuring_scepters)Conjuring Scepter$().
